package main

import (
	"io/ioutil"

	"github.com/lu4p/binclude"
)

func main() {
	binclude.IncludeFromFile("includefile.txt")

	f, err := BinFS.Open("file.txt")
	if err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}

	out, err := ioutil.ReadAll(f)
	if err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}

	println(string(out))

	infos, err := BinFS.ReadDir("./assets")
	if err != nil {
		panic(err)
	}

	for _, info := range infos {
		println(info.Name())
	}
}
